data.title: Too many panhandlers in the property
data.text: Sadly this franchise is the arm pit of our town. The only good thing about this branch is the drive-thru... as you don;t have to deal with the panhandlers that meet you coming in and coming out the doors. Some are even so bold as to come inside. People have complained to management but nothing seems to work. I refuse to got the this site until the homeless panhandlers "are removed and kept away - once and for all." My peers feel the same.
